name: game-2048
description: This repository contains a JavaScript implementation of the classic 2048 puzzle game. The game board is a 4x4 grid where players combine numbered tiles by moving them in one of four directions: left, right, up, or down. When two tiles of the same number collide, they merge into one tile with the sum of their values. The goal of the game is to create a tile with the value of 2048.
